body.name: Security Camera Wireless Outdoor, 2-Way Talk Battery Powered Wi-Fi Cameras for Outside and Indoor 1080P Night Vision AI Motion Detection Spotlight Siren Alarm IP65 Weatherproof
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: [1080p HD Security Camera Live Video and Full Color Night Vision] 110° wide-angle lens, 1920*1080p ultra-HD quality wifi camera. Dual light source night vision camera. Full-color night vision and infrared night vision are two-way options. Excellent lens and exquisite picture quality, a wireless outdoor security camera will not miss a single detail. (*Not support 5g WiFi)

[100% Wireless Security Camera and Rechargeable Battery WiFi Cam] Wireless outdoor camera with a built-in high performance rechargeable battery. It’s a true low-power consumption security camera for the home. No need for any wires, can be installed wherever you want. Indoor and outdoor scenes at a glance. Easy to install, can adjust the angle or dismantle at will. (*Only work with 2.4Ghz WiFi)

[Intelligent PIR Motion Detection and Instant Alerts] Security camera has a built-in infrared motion detection sensor. Any indication of movement within the target range will instantly send a notification to your phone via the VicoHome app. (Customizable monitoring range)

[Two-Way Talk and Intelligent Alarm] Built-in microphone and speaker, no matter where you are, you can talk to visitors, couriers, or callers at any time. Flashing white lights and sirens will drive away unwanted visitors. The PIR Motion Detection of the bullet camera is also triggered to record.

[Free 3-Day Video History Cloud Storage and IP65 Waterproof] Wireless security camera has dual storage mode. Support SD card and cloud storage, double guarantee for your video. Free rolling past 3-day cloud storage, a 30-day free trial of advanced features, including upgraded cloud memory, AI recognition, and custom alarm areas. The wireless security cam is protected by IP65 weatherproof technology, secures your home despite rain, snow, and shine. (*Only work with 2.4Ghz WiFi)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 2,459 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: “I installed it outside my garden and it works fine. It caught the deer that ate my plants and I will buy two more to install on my farm.” This wireless security camera is all-around, such as motion detection, full-color night vision, AI intelligent recognition, and other functions.The detachable design allows it to be placed anywhere, indoors or outdoors.Guarding your security and personal privacy is our top priority.

“Two-way audio is great. I love the siren and spotlight feature, always scaring away the bad guys.” Multiple alarm modes, multiple security barriers Equipped with ultra-sensitive PIR motion sensors and a variety of alarm methods. Support two-way talk, flash alarm, and siren alert.

“I can see everything going on in front of the door. Oh my God! My cat ran out again at night!” Let the night no longer be blurry (from the vision of the camera) You could freely choose full-color night vision or infrared night vision to watch your home's every move through real-time video.

“I don't have to pay to use the cloud storage feature, which is great.” No need to worry about the monthly fee for cloud storage It comes with a free 3-day rolling cloud storage.Support cloud storage and SD card storage, double security.

“I installed it in the yard. To avoid cars on the road always waking up the camera, I set the monitoring area I want, which works very well.” Real smart home security camera Custom Specify Activity Zones: delineation of up to 3 zonesAl Intelligent Recognition: Intelligently identify humans, vehicles, pets, packages Just alert what you care about

Q: Do I have to pay extra fees for the cloud service?A: No. You could use the foundation cloud plan which includes: 1) 10~15s motion alert videos. 2) alert videos being saved in the cloud for 3 days (or 0.5GB rolling cloud storage). You could also choose paid cloud plans for more services.Q: What features can I enjoy after paying for it?A: In addition to cloud storage records at different times, paid users can also experience AI custom notifications and custom monitoring areas. The camera will analyze the video and you will be notified only when the camera recognizes a person, pet, vehicle, or package.Q: Can you use multiple cameras in multiple locations?A: You could set up one or more cameras at the same time.Q: Does the camera support a micro SD card?A: Yes. We recommend a 32G-128G storage size.

Ultra-low-power consumption Built-in high performance low power battery. Security camera with a rechargeable battery that can use up to 6 months when fully charged. Multi-device View & Device Sharing Security camera wireless outdoor supports multiple users to view it simultaneously. Share happiness, and protect house property with the wifi camera. What's in the box Kit X6Pin X1Camera X1Bracket X2USB Cable X2Instruction X1Packing Box X1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Performance Camera
reviews.reviewText: I was thinking about buying a camera for my outdoor surveillance which would be far less expensive but perfect to perform. I had heard about famous surveillance cameras in the market but they were all expensive. I just came across this camera by chance, while looking for cameras thinking it may not that good as the famous ones. Vow. Boy, I am surprised. This camera is not only far less expensive but turned out to be super good. It has all the features that you can find in an expensive camera. It has a very clear view even at night, has a sound ability both ways ( can talk and hear), record what you see. It is very easy to operate. It comes with a rechargeable battery. I was not expecting that and was happily surprised. It is exactly the kind that I was looking for it. I am really happy with it. It is a very good product and is a great Christmas and birthday gift. Recommend it highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice image quality, night vision is very good as well
reviews.reviewText: This is the fourth camera purchased from this manufacturer.The good:1. Installation is straightforward. Download the app, connect the device to Wi-Fi, position the camera for best viewing, and you are done.2. The app (free) is pretty much bug free and works well on Apple products. I don’t have any direct experience with other platforms.3. Image clarity is very good as is color rendition.4. Nigh vision mode is surprisingly good. Of course, its range is limited to about 40 feet or so.5. You can use the app without monthly charges. If more functionality is desired plans are available to greatly increase the productivity of the devices.6. The devices can be shared with other users.7. All my devices were hardwired but I helped a friend install a solar unit and they are happy with its performance.The not so good:1. An app is required to access the devices. To the best of my knowledge there is no website where these images can be accessed. This makes it unavailable for smart homes.2. The mounting hardware has gotten less robust over time. The devices were ordered over a space of a year or so. Picture quality is still very good, but the mounting hardware not longer includes the easily adjustable magnetic mounts. What is supplied is sufficient, but just barely so. The device uses a standard ¼-20 screw so fabricating a mount would not be difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good cameras with a caveat
reviews.reviewText: These cameras are very easy to set up, the app is good. Connectivity is good. They are built nicely and work well. The one thing that really gets me though is manufacturers who want to get you to sign up for a monthly plan to get full functionality. Im not talking about data storage. If I paid for a product I EXPECT FULL FUNCTIONALITY STRAIGHT OUT OF THE BOX!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These babies really work!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First bought 2 cameras in Dec 2022. Also purchased 2 solar panels separately. Charged the cameras, then installed the VicoHome app on my tablet. Got the cameras paired with the app - no problems. Initially, I purchased the cameras to watch the stray cats coming around. Live in a rural area and had also have coyotes to deal with. I had placed the cameras in a variety of locations, before deciding I needed 2 more. Purchased 2 more a month later.The cameras are located:1. Cat's room. I have a male TNR (Trap,Neuter,Release) that appeared 5 yrs ago. He has tried to kill my female (she appeared 10 yrs ago), so he is kept in his own room and let out, via window, every afternoon, when I bring the female in. I've watched a few stray cats that appeared 7 months ago, enter his room, eat his food, lay on the bed - mostly at night. Yet the videos are clear as day. Camera running on battery. Charge lasts several months. (Honestly have only plugged it in twice since purchase) 2. Under the house. I have a food and water dish under the house for the strays, protected them in the winter from the cold. Dark under there. The camera works just fine. Can see which cat shows up when. Also helped to spot a water pipe breakage. Camera plugged in to outlet that's also under the house.3. Chicken pen. Got more chicks and noticed that area was a traffic run for the coyotes. Will watch the footage to gauge when the coyotes show up. Camera hooked up to a small solar panel. Retains full charge constantly.4. On flatbed trailer. Placed at the opposite end of the property (300 yards from house/wifi). To watch for coyotes or other animal visitors (caught neighbor's dog on it the other day). Has provided awesome sunset shots. Had a massive storm recently - watched the nickel sized hail bounce off the ground. Camera unscathed. Camera hooked up to a small solar panel. Retains full charge constantly.-I don't have any of the cameras mounted. Though will do the chicken pen camera as the weeds are growing to obscure its line of sight. The cameras outside have weathered snow, wind, hail, rain, and heat. Still performing wonderfully.- I personally love the picture quality. Daylight scenes, obviously, show more detail and distance. Nighttime is still quite clear, though the distance is reduced. Unless rain or dirt covers the lens. Has happened. Wipe off and good to go.- Motion detection is usually good though can be wanting. Have watched Romeo come into the bedroom from the window but never seen him leave. I've walked in the cat's bedroom and it's recorded me at the far end and leaving but not walking in. Has happened a few times but is generally great at motion capture. Hence 4 of 5 stars.- The sound is exceptionally clear and loud. The two-way sound works great. I've spoken my husband through one and could hear him clearly responding back.- I didn't pay for the subscription - I just use the free service with the VicoHome. I get 3 days of 20 secs videos that I can download. They automatically get stored in the Google picture gallery. You set up the videos record segments yourself. Determine the length of the video (20 secs is longest), Motion detection (low, med, high), record in SD or HD, alert notifications (because of the chickens moving constantly, I turned off the notifications. Got one every 20 secs), have light activated or not. There is a button to press for a white light to come on. I used that to see the water leak under the house in better detail.- Each camera is listed by video window on the app. An icon will show you if there are motion detected videos to watch per camera.Not sure what else to say except that I'm purchasing more to place on the house. Had a coyote howl outside the kitchen window last night and haven't seen Romeo or Zoreh since. Hopefully, I'll see them on the camera under the house tonight or tomorrow.Videos/photo: 1. Coyote at chicken pen 2. BrightEyes and Zoreh under the house 3. Outside daylight from flatbed trailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, awesome little camera!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is just perfect. I do not have a single complaint. So easy to setup and get connected to wifi. The battery life is awesome. I charge it once in 7 days. The app is awesome and very easy to use and share with other family members. The image quality is also very good, I like that you can zoom in and also turn a light on if it's dark and you can't see very well. You can talk to people through the camera and also sound an alarm all from your app. Another helpful feature is that you can turn your notifications on and off or set them on a timer. I highly recommend this camera, so much better than those silly door bell cameras everyone has. Worth everyone penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great so far
reviews.reviewText: Camera is well made and easy to use. Picture quality isn’t bad and it can use removable micro as cards for storage. Motion detection could be a bit better. Very happy with product so far
